name: Whatsnstore
overview:
With Whatsnstore we are trying to bring about a cultural change in the way local businesses communicate with customers. A business can update Status, offers, coupons or whatever it want’s onto its profile page.

Consider a couple of examples: An apparel store: the manager can update about the end of the season sale, arrival of a new IPL accessory or float a form to see how many customers would be interested in new shoes that will go on sale.

A pub: If the manager feels that there arenâ€™t many customers coming in on a Thursday he can update about an extension in happy hours for that day or a special offering for nearby residents or a special discount if somebody is celebrating a birthday.

This provides the business to update just about anything that will help to increase, business sales, profits, footfalls and customer interaction.

Users can Search and follow their favorite businesses at their fingertips. Users will never miss out on any offer, promotion or anything thatâ€™s new in a business.
